title: Difference equations for correlation functions of Belavin's $Z_n$-symmetric model with boundary reflection
abstract: Belavin's $\mathbb{Z}_n$-symmetric elliptic model with boundary reflection is considered on the basis of the boundary CTM bootstrap. We find non-diagonal $K$-matrices for $n>2$ that satisfy the reflection equation (boundary Yang--Baxter equation), and also find non-diagonal Boltzmann weights for the $A^{(1)}_{n-1}$-face model even for $n\geqq 2$. We derive difference equations of the quantum Knizhnik-Zamolodchikov type for correlation functions of the boundary model. The boundary spontaneous polarization is obtained by solving the simplest difference equations. The resulting quantity is the square of the spontaneous polarization for the bulk $\mathbb{Z}_n$-symmetric model, up to a phase factor.
